34:["$","div",null,{"className":"bg-white rounded-xl border border-slate-200 p-6","children":[["$","h3",null,{"className":"text-xl font-semibold text-slate-900 mb-4 flex items-center gap-2","children":[["$","svg",null,{"ref":"$undefined","xmlns":"http://www.w3.org/2000/svg","width":24,"height":24,"viewBox":"0 0 24 24","fill":"none","stroke":"currentColor","strokeWidth":2,"strokeLinecap":"round","strokeLinejoin":"round","className":"lucide lucide-building2 lucide-building-2 w-5 h-5 text-slate-600","aria-hidden":"true","children":[["$","path","a56b0p",{"d":"M10 12h4"}],["$","path","1sr2af",{"d":"M10 8h4"}],["$","path","1rgiei",{"d":"M14 21v-3a2 2 0 0 0-4 0v3"}],["$","path","secmi2",{"d":"M6 10H4a2 2 0 0 0-2 2v7a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h16a2 2 0 0 0 2-2V9a2 2 0 0 0-2-2h-2"}],["$","path","16ra0t",{"d":"M6 21V5a2 2 0 0 1 2-2h8a2 2 0 0 1 2 2v16"}],"$undefined"]}],"Breaking Your Lease"]}],["$","p",null,{"className":"text-slate-600 mb-4","children":"Argentine rental law (Ley de Alquileres) changed recently. 3a:["$","div",null,{"className":"mt-8 bg-white rounded-xl border border-slate-200 p-6","children":[["$","h3",null,{"className":"text-xl font-semibold text-slate-900 mb-4 flex items-center gap-2","children":[["$","svg",null,{"ref":"$undefined","xmlns":"http://www.w3.org/2000/svg","width":24,"height":24,"viewBox":"0 0 24 24","fill":"none","stroke":"currentColor","strokeWidth":2,"strokeLinecap":"round","strokeLinejoin":"round","className":"lucide lucide-file-check w-5 h-5 text-slate-600","aria-hidden":"true","children":[["$","path","1oefj6",{"d":"M6 22a2 2 0 0 1-2-2V4a2 2 0 0 1 2-2h8a2.4 2.4 0 0 1 1.704.706l3.588 3.588A2.4 2.4 0 0 1 20 8v12a2 2 0 0 1-2 2z"}],["$","path","wfsgrz",{"d":"M14 2v5a1 1 0 0 0 1 1h5"}],["$","path","1grp1n",{"d":"m9 15 2 2 4-4"}],"$undefined"]}],"Tax Obligations: What You Need to Know"]}],["$","div",null,{"className":"prose prose-slate max-w-none","children":[["$","p",null,{"className":"text-slate-600","children":"Argentina taxes residents on worldwide income. Even after you leave, you may have filing obligations depending on your residency status:"}],["$","ul",null,{"className":"text-slate-600 space-y-2","children":[["$","li",null,{"children":[["$","strong",null,{"children":"If you keep residency:"}]," You may still need to file annual tax returns (DDJJ) and report foreign assets if they exceed thresholds."]}],["$","li",null,{"children":[["$","strong",null,{"children":"If you renounce residency:"}]," File a final tax return for the year you leave. You may need to pay exit taxes on certain assets."]}],["$","li",null,{"children":[["$","strong",null,{"children":"Bienes Personales:"}]," Annual wealth tax on worldwide assets. Even non-residents may owe this on Argentine assets."]}]]}],["$","div",null,{"className":"bg-amber-50 border border-amber-200 rounded-lg p-4 mt-4","children":["$","p",null,{"className":"text-amber-800 text-sm","children":[["$","span",null,{"className":"font-medium","children":"Disclaimer:"}]," Tax law is complex and changes frequently. This is general information, not advice. Consult a certified Argentine accountant (contador público) before leaving to understand your specific obligations."]}]}]]}]]}]
3b:["$","div",null,{"className":"mt-6 bg-white rounded-xl border border-slate-200 p-6","children":[["$","h3",null,{"className":"text-xl font-semibold text-slate-900 mb-4","children":"Do You Need to Cancel Your DNI?"}],["$","p",null,{"className":"text-slate-600 mb-4","children":"Short answer: Usually no, unless you're renouncing citizenship (which is rare and extreme)."}],["$","div",null,{"className":"grid md:grid-cols-2 gap-6","children":[["$","div",null,{"children":[["$","p",null,{"className":"font-medium text-slate-900 mb-2","children":"Your DNI stays valid if:"}],["$","ul",null,{"className":"space-y-1 text-sm text-slate-600","children":[["$","li",null,{"children":"• You're leaving temporarily"}],["$","li",null,{"children":"• You're keeping permanent residency"}],["$","li",null,{"children":"• You might return someday"}],["$","li",null,{"children":"• You want to maintain voting rights"}]]}]]}],["$","div",null,{"children":[["$","p",null,{"className":"font-medium text-slate-900 mb-2","children":"Consider formal renunciation if:"}],["$","ul",null,{"className":"space-y-1 text-sm text-slate-600","children":[["$","li",null,{"children":"• You're becoming a citizen elsewhere that doesn't allow dual citizenship"}],["$","li",null,{"children":"• You want to completely sever tax residency"}],["$","li",null,{"children":"• You never plan to return and want a clean break"}]]}]]}]]}],["$","p",null,{"className":"text-sm text-slate-500 mt-4","children":"Most expats simply let their DNI expire if they're not returning, or keep it current if they might. There's no penalty for having an inactive DNI."}]]}]
